full_summary:
**Washroom Building Design - Jasper National Park**
==============================================

**Notice Title**
----------------

This notice is a request for proposal (RFP) soliciting interested firms to provide architectural services for the design of a public washroom building renovation and upgrade project at Jasper National Park.

**Proposal Submission**
-------------------

The RFP requires interested firms to submit their proposals electronically to the address:
soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca

Proposals received by fax or email will be accepted as official. It is essential to exclude in-person or courier submissions, as they will not be considered. Attachments with links to bid documents should also not be used.

**Project Overview**
-----------------

The Parks Canada Agency requires architectural services to design a public washroom building renovation and upgrade in Jasper National Park. The project includes conceptual plans and preliminary design services for converting existing facilities into a new, inclusive washroom facility, adhering to Parks Canada directives.

**Submission Requirements**
----------------------

Submitters are encouraged to review the attached RFP documents and appendices carefully to ensure they understand the requirements and specifications outlined. It is crucial to note that late submissions will not be considered.

**Contact Information**
--------------------

The Contracting Authority can be reached for inquiries regarding this RFP at:
Park Canada 
30 Victoria Street 
Gatineau, QC J8X 0B3 
Canada
Phone: 604-358-9479 
Email: [carmen.song@pc.gc.ca](mailto:carmen.song@pc.gc.ca)

**Language**
------------

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French). However, if discrepancies are found between the English and French documents, the bidder should notify the Contracting Authority immediately.

**Attachments**
--------------

Available attachments include the following:

- RFP document: [rfp_22-0215.pdf](http://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/23/3a7dffd40237fd502ec8a2faeffcdd86/rfp_22-0215.pdf)
